text: This Chinese dialogue is about making a snowman (雪人). Learn some colours and body parts at the same time!小明：你看，下雪了！小红：我们一起去堆雪人吧。小明：雪人想要什么颜色的眼睛呢？小红：黑色！小明：那鼻子呢？小红：红色！小明：好的，那我先回家给雪人找黑色的眼睛和红色的鼻子。小明：Look, it’s snowing!小红：Let’s go make a snowman together.小明：What color eyes do snowmen want?小红：Black!小明：What about the nose?小红：Red!小明：Ok, then I will go home and find black eyes and red nose for the snowman.1 – 下雪了，他们要干什么？a. 上课b. 看电视c. 堆雪人d. 玩电脑2 – 雪人的鼻子是什么颜色的？a. 黑色b. 蓝色c. 绿色d. 红色1. c2. dReview frequently.Share with others.Return as often as you can.
